name: Whale Snake!
description:
Arrow Keys to move.

Don't let its looks deceive you! Despite looking EXACTLY like a real whale, the Whale Snake acts a lot like a snake. Get the golden cubes of whale food to grow longer, don't hit yourself, you know the drill.

The Whale-snake sometimes crashes in browser mode. Refreshing the page can help. For a less crash-prone version that can save your high score between gaming sessions, download the game (I can't playtest for Windows, but hopefully it'll work)
